issue.title: [CI] Remove Kartothek integration tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17889](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17889). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed on the following mailing list thread:

<https://lists.apache.org/thread/bqj7mordgf53ctws5jl1kdr0l4671nlj>


The Kartothek project does not seem to be active anymore. The last merged
PR was in December 2021. There has been several failures around the Nightlies for it  https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17683

And
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16262

This ticket is to remove the integration tests for it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17889?focusedCommentId=17611244) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14274
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14274>
